thread.title: [SPONSORED POST] Close to 100 ATF buyers already offered a hosting place
thread.title_full: [SPONSORED POST] Close to 100 ATF buyers already offered a hosting place

author: Singapore, August 19, 2015
title: [SPONSORED POST] Close to 100 ATF buyers already offered a hosting place
text:
[SPONSORED POST] Close to 100 ATF buyers already offered a hosting place Singapore, August 19, 2015 
TO DATE, some 500 buyer registrations from 61 countries across all continents have applied to attend ATF 2016. Another 300 hosting places will be accorded to eligible applicants over the coming weeks. 

Procurement and business objectives across all buyer applicants have been diverse. Anthony Hill, founding director of Adventure Travel, Australia said he is “looking to expand our partnerships with local DMCs and suppliers from across the ASEAN region”, while Antonie Noens, managing director of Easy Tours, Belgium is most interested in countries like “Thailand, Indochina and Indonesia, as well as service providers who can provide incentive deals.” 

Click here to see who our buyer applicants want to meet. Book a booth now before the early bird promotion ends on September 15, 2015. 

For more information about exhibiting, email atfsellers@ttgasia.com or visit www.atfphilippines.com/Exhibitor.php .
